datools 0.1.0

    • Negative Binomial Applications

Find the relationship between the variables in a data set and fit that model

Source: R/variablerelationships.R
discover_hierarchy_and_fit.Rd

Finds the hirarchical relationship between all variables and connects them in a network such as to optimize the mutual information. This just fits the network selected by HillClimbing using a Bayesian information criteria (BIC).

discover_hierarchy_and_fit(data)

Arguments

data

the data.frame containing the observations and variables to inspect

Value

a character matrix with columns from and to representing the variables that are related

Examples

data(iris)
data(mtcars)
library(dplyr)
discover_hierarchy_and_fit(mtcars)
#> 
#>   Bayesian network parameters
#>
